name: 1983, 18th Floor
description:
It's 1983, you get home after a long day of hard work at the office, you got a copy from Digital Poison's last game, YOSAI, you pop that floppy into your computer and get lost in the electronic fantasies.

1983, 18th Floor is the presentation of the YOSAI video game, a maze run and gun shooter. Explore the rooms, collect weapons and lives, and make your way out of the tower.

Features

  • A demake with a cool presentation.
  • Minimalist graphics.
  • A gameplay with a mix of shooting and stealth, move silently in violence, or go all-guns blazing.
  • Place your .ogg files in the "music" folder to play them during the game.
